title: Clatto Reservoir Country Park Walking and Cycle Route

nearby.description: Dundee Walks - Dudhope Park and Dundee Law

images.title: James Allan / Frosty dam wall
images.caption: Frosty dam wall. In the shadow of the trees, early morning frost lingers on the wall of Clatto reservoir.

images.title: Val Vannet / Clatto Country Park
images.caption: Former reservoir for Dundee now turned country park.

images.title: Path in Templeton Woods by Douglas Nelson, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Path in Templeton Woods. These peaceful woods are located just to the south of the reservoir. You can follow trails through the woods to Camperdown Park.

images.title: Gallow Hill by Rude Health, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Gallow Hill Water Tower.

description: Enjoy miles of well laid out cycling and walking trails in this lovely country park in Dundee. The route starts by taking you around the large reservoir on the waterside path. Look out for a variety of birdlife including Pochard, Goldeneye, Tufted Ducks, Moorhen, and Coot. The route then heads into the peaceful Templeton Woods where you can look out for red squirrels. If you would like to continue your outing you could visit the adjacent Camperdown Park where you will find another 400 acres of pretty parkland and a Wildlife Centre.
